/* VerRecvMapper.selectStoreDtl */
SELECT tms.STORE_CD, tcpvs.VER_SER_NO, tcpv.VER_SER_NM, tcpvs.VER_RECV_FG, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tcpvs.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tcpvs.VER_RECV_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') VER_RECV_DT FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_CM_POS_VERSN_STORE tcpvs, TB_CM_POS_VERSN tcpv WHERE tms.STORE_CD = 'DS00001' AND tcpvs.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND tcpv.VER_SER_NO = tcpvs.VER_SER_NO ORDER BY tcpvs.REG_DT DESC
